title: A Date with the Future
overview: During the earthquake, Xu Lai was trapped, but was rescued by firefighter Jin Shichuan and his rescue dog. Ten years later, Xu Lai returns to China as a journalist and international dog handler. She meets Jin Shichuan at the rescue site, but Shichuan not only does not recognize her, but also takes her for an unscrupulous reporter. When a search and rescue team is formed, the girl becomes Jin Shichuan's partner and wins respect with her high professional skills. A journalist and a firefighter, these two are on the front line of danger, on the verge of life and death, and their relationship gradually improves.
